title: launch hanging issue or not opening constantly repairing lol
body:
Hi all anyone having launch issues, i couldnt use league for ages it ran crappy launch wouldnt work and the fix posted wen league exits does same thing is most likely due to pups spyware corrupting internet explorer and running hidden tasks in the background wich most antispyware wont pick up even the new ones! they seem to come from the dodgy sights that show up in internet search usualy a few before the legit sites are there even accesing it once will put the pup in, only way i fixed this done full format needed multiple format just incase and remove cmos chip reset bios reinstalled windows, then install league again or it will always lag on launch even if you remove them. thats what fixed mine now runs smooth as babys bottom :) gl all

ps carfull wen backing up data try take the least amount with you just incase its infected somwear(use this even if you have antivirus antispyware its a standalone free program for that specificly will remove the infection http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/download/junkware-removal-tool/ tho it will not fix the damage( if you dont disinfect before reformat it will persist so do that first! gl all
